# Welcome to An applied genomic epidemiological handbook {-}

This handbook provides a short guide to the theory and practice of viral genomic epidemiology for public health. It is intended to be an open resource - if you feel that this resource would be useful to someone, please share it with them. This handbook is almost meant to be "living". If you would like to recommend changes, find errors you think should be corrected, or you'd like to see a topic added, please [open an issue in the git repo](https://github.com/alliblk/genepi-book/issues).
